dcterms:creator: S. Haq
P.J.B. Jackson
dcterms:description: The SAVEE dataset contains 480 acted English utterances recorded by four male actors and consists of seven emotion categories: anger, fear, disgust, happiness, neutral, sadness, and surprise.
dcterms:title: SAVEE

dcterms:creator: Felix Burkhardt
Astrid Paeschke
M. Rolfes
Walter F. Sendlmeier
Benjamin Weiss
dcterms:description: The EmoDB dataset consists of 535 German utterances from 10 actors (5 female, 5 male) and includes seven emotion categories: anger, anxiety, boredom, disgust, happiness, neutral, and sadness.
dcterms:title: EmoDB

dcterms:creator: Houwei Cao
David G Cooper
Michael K Keutmann
Ruben C Gur
Ani Nenkova
Ragini Verma
dcterms:description: The CREMA-D dataset consists of 7,442 videos of 91 actors (48 male and 43 female) from various ethnic groups. Actors portray a variety of emotions by uttering 12 specific sentences that correspond to one of six emotional categories: anger, fear, disgust, happiness, neutrality, and sadness.
dcterms:title: CREMA-D
